item.title: Transmediale 2023
item.description: I attended Transmediale and gave a very small presentation as part of the panel Toward Minor Tech. This is the result of a workshop organised by by Geoff Cox and Christian Ulrik Andersen every year as part of SHAPE Digital Citizenship & Digital Aesthetics Research Center, Aarhus University and Centre for the Study of the Networked Image, London South Bank University, this year in collaboration with Kingâ€™s College London.
